conclusion: Analyze forces on blocks A and B using equilibrium condition to find mass of block B
Block A is on a smooth slope inclined at 30Â°
Identify forces on block A: gravitational force mg, normal force N, tension T
Resolve gravitational force on block A into parallel component mg/2 and perpendicular component sqrt(3)mg/2
Equilibrium condition for block A: tension T equals mg/2
Identify forces on block B: gravitational force m_B g and tension T
Equilibrium condition for block B: m_B g equals 2T
Substitute T from block A into block B's equilibrium condition: m_B g equals mg
Solve for mass of block B: m_B equals m
